Smart Vac: A smart vacuum cleaner that uses AI to navigate and learn your home's layout, adapting to your cleaning needs. It can also identify and avoid obstacles, and even recharge itself when needed. Confidence Score: 0.8

Air Purifier Vac: A vacuum cleaner that doubles as an air purifier, using advanced filtration technology to remove pollutants and allergens from the air. It can also monitor air quality and adjust its cleaning settings accordingly. Confidence Score: 0.9

Self-Emptying Vac: A vacuum cleaner that automatically empties itself, eliminating the need for manual emptying. It can also detect when the bin is full and schedule an emptying for when it's most convenient. Confidence Score: 0.8

Robot Vac: A robotic vacuum cleaner that can navigate your home on its own, avoiding obstacles and cleaning more efficiently. It can also be controlled remotely using a smartphone app. Confidence Score: 0.9

Vacuum-Powered Coffee Maker: A vacuum cleaner that also doubles as a coffee maker, using the suction power to brew coffee beans and grind them to the perfect consistency. It can also be programmed to automatically brew a pot of coffee at a set time each day. Confidence Score: 0.7
